Name: Solrock Bow
LongDescription: Enables the occasional use of a move with no PP consumption. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Solrock.  Finding a Solrock Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
